main event: An observer reports seeing a bright light that increased and decreased in size before disappearing on the evening of October 23, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 20 minutes., The observer did not determine the altitude or distance of the object., The object was reported to be silver/metallic in color., The object could move behind or in front of clouds., The conclusion was that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Not specified in detail but indicates observer reported alone.
